alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 8:27AM CDT until October 28 at 8:42AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. Black River Near Galesville affecting Trempealeau and La Crosse Counties. .The Black River at Black River Falls has crested. Additional precipitation last night and today are not expected to produce additional rises. Water will continue to rise downstream at Galesville through Friday night. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast to fall into minor flood stage tonight. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 52.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 43.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 AM CDT Thursday was 56.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 38.3 feet Thursday, November 02. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CDT.
